title: WhatsApp announces long-awaited Reactions and Community features
content:
It’s been a while since 9to5Mac reported that WhatsApp was developing Reactions and Community features. Now, the company has finally announced both of them as official. Here’s everything you need to know.

more…

The post WhatsApp announces long-awaited Reactions and Community features appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WhatsApp has finally announced that Reactions, Community, file sharing increase, and more are coming to the app in 2022.
